messages.title: VOTE LIKE OUR FUTURE DEPENDS ON IT
messages.content: At this election, our future is at stake. This is our chance to tackle the climate emergency. To build a fairer Scotland after the pandemic. And to secure our future as an independent country.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Secure a green recovery and create over 100,000 jobs by investing in public transport, warm homes and renewable energy.
Recruit 5,500 additional permanent teachers and help our schools & young people recover from the pandemic.
Invest in our NHS, including an additional £235 million a year for mental health services, prioritising the needs of children and young people.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Polls show Scottish Greens can win more MSPs than ever, in every part of Scotland.

issues.economy: Secure a green recovery and create over 100,000 jobs by investing in public transport, warm homes and renewable energy.
issues.education: Recruit 5,500 additional permanent teachers and help our schools & young people recover from the pandemic.
issues.environment: Secure a green recovery by investing in renewable energy. Saved Loch Lomond from a destructive development.
issues.health: Invest in our NHS, including an additional £235 million a year for mental health services, prioritising the needs of children and young people.

housing.content: Warm homes part of the green recovery investment.

politicalExperience.achievements: Evictions banned during the pandemic. Restored all school grades lowered by the SQA. Saved Loch Lomond from a destructive development. Free bus travel for under 22s from this summer.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Vote like our future depends on it. VOTE GREEN
